p: Essential oils from thyme ( Thymus vulgaris) and clove ( Szygium aromaticum) were purchased from Young Living Essential Oils (Lehi, MT, USA) and were used without further purification. The oils were stored at 5 Â°C, and stock solutions in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) were prepared and used in the same day to minimize volatilization and change in chemical properties.
